item.description:
Night out at Foxwoods, aka our mini Vegas here in Connecticut: RSVP and give me a call if you need more information. We'll be meeting up at Hard Rock Cafe for food and drinks around 08:30p.m. http://www.hardrock.com/locations/cafes3/cafe.aspx?LocationID=375&MIBEnumID=3

We'll mingle and socialize - for new members it will be a nice opportunity to meet and get to know everyone in the group. Give me a call 860-919-9782 when you arrive and I'll greet and introduce you in to the group. We'll stay at Hard Rock for a bit then make our way to MGM Shrine Night Club sometime before 11 so ladies can get in for free: http://www.shrinemgmfoxwoods.com/nightlife/

Ladies $10 and no cover before 11p.m. /Gents $20 Dress code is trendy upscale. RSVP and feel free to give me a call should you have any questions. Everyone has been wanting a Casino night so we're making it happen. Also Christian and I are planning another party bus event for the 29th of July. Was a huge hit before so we want to make this happen again.

Looking forward to seeing you all and until then have fun!

Cheers,

John
item.name: FRIDAY JAM @ HARD ROCK CAFE & MGM GRAND - SHRINE @ FOXWOODS CASINO
